0010110001010001 0110111111110101 0 -> sum: 1001110001000110, cout: 0
0110001110111100 1100011111110111 1 -> sum: 0010101110110100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
